prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (imposing massive gray alien warrior:1.2), (weathered gray biological skin:1.3), giant black void eyes, stoic unwavering expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (subtle skin imperfections and prominent veins:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching heavy ballistic fabric texture on uniform:1.3), cinematic dramatic lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human skin tone, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, friendly face, small, weak build
